text: Dmytro Hnatyuk (; 28 March 1925 â€“ 29 April 2016) was a Ukrainian baritone opera singer and a former member of the Ukrainian Parliament. He was a singer at the Kyiv Opera and Ballet Theatre appearing as a soloist in many songs. Hnatyuk was elected the head of the Musical Society of Ukraine. Hnatyuk died on 29 April 2016, aged 91. He was buried at Kyiv's Baikove Cemetery.Newspaper: Ukrainian opera singer Dmytro Hnatyuk passes away, Interfax-Ukraine (29 April 2016) ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Ukrainian singers Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Dmytro Hnatyuk
